page.title: 12MR AND MRS SMITH'S MOVE
page.content:
Mr and Mrs Smith used to live at 5 Ross Road in Brampton Abbotts when the landlady decided to sell the cottages, one of which Mr and Mrs Smith lived in.They moved on a Saturday in February and hired a van for Â£10 to move the furniture to a new estate in Ross.They found their new rented house had central heating which meant it was very warm,a modern kitchen which pleased Mrs Smith and the house had a nice sized garden for Mr Smith to manage.Their house is nearer to town which is convienent for them but they have to use the car more because Mrs Smith works in Brampton Abbotts.Mr Smith brings Mrs Smith in his car to the school each morning.
{ By { Ester Gould
